home.senaDescription:
This video "SENA is Colombia" is an official production of the National Training Service (SENA), a Colombian public entity attached to the Ministry of Labor. The purpose of this video is to highlight the fundamental role of SENA in the social and economic development of the country, emphasizing its commitment to comprehensive professional training and the employability of Colombians.

The production features testimonials from apprentices, instructors, and entrepreneurs who have benefited from SENA programs, showing how the institution contributes to the personal and professional growth of millions of citizens. It also emphasizes SENA's presence throughout the national territory, its focus on technological innovation, and its role in promoting entrepreneurship
